description: Added new card styles for About page sections with comprehensive dark mode support for iOS Safari compatibility.
Removed image proxy route and refactored image editor components to directly use image URLs, simplifying logic and improving performance.
Implemented cross-origin image handling in image editor with proxy support to avoid CORS issues when working with external images.
Added comprehensive image editor feature with cropping, rotation, and lighting adjustments including brightness, contrast, color correction, and shadow/highlight controls.
